description: This course will teach you the basics on how to use the iPad with iOS 9. The training explains the iPad interface, its buttons and connectors, how to use screen shortcuts (a.k.a. as Gestures), how to connect to Wi-Fi, how to search on iPad and how to use the Calendar, Clock, Contacts and Reminders Apps. It includes a bonus section. This course will teach you how to use your iPad in a more productive and effective way.
title: iPad iOS 9 Training for Beginners
